body_html:
Thanks for pointing me to the file. I also made a couple small changes to two other files that I found may be relevant and submitted a PR (#12785).

Thanks for the disclaimer! I'm aware of that and I'm actually trying to find out what may be broken in the API. Thanks for releasing it early in any case. It's super useful for languages that do not have anything like numpy available. It certainly helps a lot with my Scala API.

body:
Thanks for pointing me to the file. I also made a couple small changes to two other files that I found may be relevant and submitted a PR (#12785).

Thanks for the disclaimer! I'm aware of that and I'm actually trying to find out what may be broken in the API. Thanks for releasing it early in any case. It's super useful for languages that do not have anything like numpy available. It certainly helps a lot with my Scala API.
